author: Buddha
message: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of mediation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what hold you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anatole France
message: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
title: Thought of the day

author: John Marshall
message: To listen well is as powerful a means of communication and influence as to talk well.
title: Thought of the day

author: George Sand
message: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
title: Thought of the day
